mapper.select: select jikwon_no, jikwon_name, jikwon_jik, jikwon_pay, jikwon_rating from jikwon inner join buser on buser_num = buser_no where buser_name=#{buser_name}
resultType="pack.model.Jikwon"> select jikwon_no, jikwon_name, jikwon_jik, jikwon_pay, jikwon_rating from jikwon where buser_num = #{buser_num} and jikwon_rating = #{rating}
